Method sweep for FLCore classes

Use R's sweep method on FLCore classes

# S4 method for FLArray
sweep(x, MARGIN, STATS, FUN = "-", check.margin = TRUE,
  ...)

# S4 method for FLPar
sweep(x, MARGIN, STATS, FUN = "-", check.margin = TRUE,
  ...)

Details

These methods call base R sweep method on **FLCore** classes and then ensure that the returned object is of same class.

Generic function

sweep(x, MARGIN, STATS, FUN = "-", check.margin = TRUE, ...)

See also

sweep

Examples


flq <- FLQuant(rlnorm(90), dim=c(3,10), units='kg')
# Get ratio of max value by year
sweep(flq, 2, apply(flq, 2, max), "/")
#> An object of class "FLQuant"
#> , , unit = unique, season = all, area = unique
#> 
#>      year
#> quant 1        2        3        4        5        6        7        8       
#>     1 1.000000 0.100070 0.698939 0.455343 0.144608 0.699713 0.098621 0.682368
#>     2 0.974665 1.000000 0.573980 0.799384 0.184175 0.390755 1.000000 1.000000
#>     3 0.836174 0.122749 1.000000 1.000000 1.000000 1.000000 0.089668 0.601876
#>      year
#> quant 9        10      
#>     1 0.280207 1.000000
#>     2 0.207013 0.246812
#>     3 1.000000 0.155917
#> 
#> units:  kg
